Exaggerate: The claim may exaggerate the impact of the House Zika bill on limiting access to birth control services needed to curb the spread of the virus in Puerto Rico.
Understate: The claim may understate the potential impact of the House Zika bill on limiting access to birth control services in Puerto Rico.
Lack enough support: The claim may lack enough evidence or support to conclusively prove that the House Zika bill limits access to birth control services in Puerto Rico.
Problematic assumption: The claim may make assumptions about the House Zika bill's impact on birth control services without providing sufficient evidence or analysis.
Exist alternative explanation: There may be alternative explanations or factors contributing to the limitations on birth control services in Puerto Rico, aside from the House Zika bill.
